title: Autofill; A suggestion for improvement.
body:
Autofill while useful for the issue it helps to correct is flawed due to the random nature of it. 
My idea would be to implement some kind of system that allows players to select a match to fill a role that 
is lacking so as to be properly prepared for playing a role they are likely uncomfortable or unfamiliar with.

"Autofill active" is insufficient information and has everytime led me to a loss due to playing rolls I have a 
limited champion pool for or am unprepared to play. While I endeavor to improve and understand the need for
autofill I believe giving people the option to clear the autofill could lead to better results. Or even perhaps a 
counter to let us know when it might activate. I realize there are times when there is no need for a player to fill
and so can go on for several matches in a row before it activates, but I would like to see a way that could prevent
unprepared players.

replies.body:
Learn to play all 5 roles, it's kinda simple really, not knowing how to at least not feed on all 5 roles isn't good enough.

And not enough champions is only really an excuse for ADC, and even then, you can at least have something like Ashe on an account and your cleared for that.
